name: TERPO-Reborn 1.4.1
description:
Server mod for The Exiled-RP server. DISCLAIMER: The character switch feature only works with an additional component on our server.

Home server of the mod: https://exiledce.enjin.com
changeNote:
- Warpaints no longer grant attribute bonuses. To compensate for the lost attribute points characters will earn 30 additional points by level 60.
- Further lowered stacksize for automatically generated consumables (fish, grubs, honey etc.) to 1000
- Added a few flavor items for future DM-created dungeons
author: Midnight
